select count(r.reserve_no) from reserve r
where r.state="reserve"
where r.event_no in ( select e.event_no from event e where e.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND r.state = "reserve"
where r.member_no in ( select m.member_no from member m where m.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND r.state = "reserve"

select r.*, e.img_path, e.name as e_name, m.name as m_name from reserve r inner join member m on r.member_no = m.member_no inner join event e on r.event_no = e.event_no
where r.state="reserve"
where r.event_no in ( select e.event_no from event e where e.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND r.state = "reserve"
where r.member_no in ( select m.member_no from member m where m.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND r.state = "reserve"
order by r.reserve_no desc limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}
